text.text: You are quite an emotionless being for being able to execute whoever is proclaimed guilty on the spot.
Usually it is the lords making these decisions, but you sense the corruption taking over the kingdom and you know that things are not right.
This time, you will act on your own accord and may execute one innocently proclaimed defendant during the trial that you deem guilty!

To perform that execution, you need your favorite tool - the big hammer!
You had to surrender it to the tavern's guards, but you know that they put it somewhere silly.
You can only use this weapon once and only for the trial execution.
Find the hammer and be ready to alter the future.
